17 template<typename Scalar, typename Index>
18 class PointVisitationFunctor: public Celltree<Scalar, Index>::VisitFunctor {
19  typedef vistle::Celltree<Scalar, Index> Celltree;
20  typedef typename Celltree::VisitFunctor VisitFunctor;
21  typedef typename VisitFunctor::Order Order;
22  public:
23  PointVisitationFunctor(const Vector &point)
24  : m_point(point) {
25  }
26 
27  bool checkBounds(const Scalar *min, const Scalar *max) {
28 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
29  std::cerr << "checkBounds: min: "
30  << min[0] << " " << min[1] << " " << min[2]
31  << ", max: " << max[0] << " " << max[1] << " " << max[2] << std::endl;
32 #endif
33  for (int i=0; i<3; ++i) {
34  if (min[i] > m_point[i])
35  return false;
36  if (max[i] < m_point[i])
37  return false;
38  }
39  return true;
40  }
41 
42  Order operator()(const typename Celltree::Node &node) {
43 
44 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
45  std::cerr << "visit subtree: Lmax: " << node.Lmax << ", Rmin: " << node.Rmin << std::endl;
46 #endif
47 
48  const Scalar c = m_point[node.dim];
49  if (c > node.Lmax && c < node.Rmin)
50  return VisitFunctor::None;
51  if (c < node.Rmin) {
52  return VisitFunctor::Left;
53  }
54  if (c > node.Lmax) {
55  return VisitFunctor::Right;
56  }
57 
58  const Scalar mean = Scalar(0.5) * (node.Lmax + node.Rmin);
59  if (c < mean) {
60  return VisitFunctor::LeftRight;
61  } else {
62  return VisitFunctor::RightLeft;
63  }
64  }
65 
66  private:
67  Vector m_point;
68 };
69 
70 template<typename Scalar, typename Index>
71 struct CellBoundsFunctor: public Celltree<Scalar, Index>::CellBoundsFunctor {
72 
73  CellBoundsFunctor(const GridInterface *grid)
74  : m_grid(grid)
75  {}
76 
77  bool operator()(Index elem, Vector *min, Vector *max) const {
78 
79  auto b = m_grid->cellBounds(elem);
80  *min = b.first;
81  *max = b.second;
82  return true;
83  }
84 
85  const GridInterface *m_grid;
86 };
87 
88 
89 template<class Grid, typename Scalar, typename Index>
90 class PointInclusionFunctor: public Celltree<Scalar, Index>::LeafFunctor {
91 
92  public:
93  PointInclusionFunctor(const Grid *grid, const Vector &point, bool acceptGhost=false)
94  : m_grid(grid)
95  , m_point(point)
96  , m_acceptGhost(acceptGhost)
97  , cell(InvalidIndex)
98  {
99  }
100 
101  bool operator()(Index elem) {
102 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
103  std::cerr << "PointInclusionFunctor: checking cell: " << elem << std::endl;
104 #endif
105  if (m_acceptGhost || !m_grid->isGhostCell(elem)) {
106  if (m_grid->inside(elem, m_point)) {
107 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
108  std::cerr << "PointInclusionFunctor: found cell: " << elem << std::endl;
109 #endif
110  cell = elem;
111  return false; // stop traversal
112  }
113  }
114  return true;
115  }
116  const Grid *m_grid;
117  Vector m_point;
118  bool m_acceptGhost;
119  Index cell;
120 
121 };
122 
123 }
124 #endif
